title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, attempting to create a new table group does not show the group dialog.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
